title.narrative: PROTECTION MEASURES AND EFFECTIVE ACCESS TO JUSTICE IS GRANTED

description.narrative: Al 2025, los organismos de protecciÃ³n de niÃ±as, niÃ±os y adolescentes y el poder judicial fortalecen sus capacidades para coordinar intersectorial e intergubernamentalmente diseÃ±ar e implementar abordajes integrales e inclusivos tomar las mejores medidas excepcionales de protecciÃ³n y garantizar un acceso a la justicia efectivo en casos de niÃ±as, niÃ±os, adolescentes vÃ­ctimas de violencias, en riesgo o que han perdido el cuidado parental y de adolescentes en conflicto con la ley., which contributes to Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Al 2025, las niÃ±as, niÃ±os y adolescentes en Argentina, especialmente aquellos en mayores condiciones de vulnerabilidad, vivirÃ¡n en entornos mÃ¡s seguros y protectores, y en caso de ser vÃ­ctimas de violencia o desprotecciÃ³n contarÃ¡n con una respuesta integral y acceso adecuado a la justicia.

related-activity.ref: 0240/A0/06/884 VIOLENCE-FREE ENVIRONMENTS, PROTECTION AND ACCESS TO JUSTICE

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Al 2025, los organismos de proteccion de ni?as, ni?os y adolescentes y el poder judicial fortalecen sus capacidades para coordinarintersectorial e intergubernamentalmente; dise?ar e implementar abordajes integrales e inclusivos; tomar las mejores medidasexcepcionales de proteccion; y garantizar un acceso a la justicia efectivo en casos de ni?as, ni?os, adolescentes victimas deviolencias, en riesgo o que han perdido el cuidado parental y de adolescentes en conflicto con la ley.

description.narrative: During this period, UNICEF has achieved significant results to improve interagency coordination to strengthen capacities for comprehensive protection and access to justice in cases of children victims of violence, at risk, or who have lost parental care, and adolescents in conflict with the law. This included support to national and provincial initiatives to expand access to justice and intergovernmental coordination in cases of child victims of sexual abuse and strengthen information and monitoring systems through improving institutional capacities for data generation and monitoring by Child protection, justice and control agencies. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2022
